Dot_AlrightThisLittleThisBig.content: Alright! This one is the littlest mushroom, and this one is the biggest!

Dot_CheckTapHere.content: Okay, when you want to check your answer - tap here!

Dot_DragStumps.content: Drag the mushrooms to the tree stumps!

Dot_NotShortToTall.content: Hmm. Those don't seem to be in order from shortest to tallest.

Dot_PickFinger.content: To pick a mushroom, pull it out of the ground with your finger!

Dot_PullMushrooms.content: Pull three mushrooms out of the ground and order them from shortest to tallest!

Dot_ShortHereTallHere.content: Now order these mushrooms by height!
Shortest over here, to tallest over here.

Dot_TheseLinesShow.content: These lines show the correct heights of the mushrooms. Try again!
